Title: Relates to establishing a New York State Sound Basic Education Commission to study current educational needs and recommend a new foundation aid formula; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a New York State Sound Basic Education Commission to study current educational needs and recommend a new foundation aid formula which will provide all students in the state a meaningful opportunity for a sound basic education in a cost efficient manner.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing a New York State Sound Basic Education Commission to study current educational needs and recommend a new foundation aid formula which will provide all students in the state a meaningful opportunity for a sound basic education in a cost efficient manner; and making an appropriation therefor
